Type.Name: CodeCompiler

TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class CodeCompiler : System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator, System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CodeCompiler extends System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator implements class System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: is a useful utility base class for code generators to derive from in order to provide code compilation functions.

block.para: This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. For details about security demands, see Link Demands and Inheritance Demands.

summary.para: Provides an example implementation of the interface.

summary.para: Gets the command arguments to be passed to the compiler from the specified .

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract string CompilerName { get; }
.property instance string CompilerName

Docs.value: To be added: an object of type 'string'

remarks.para: This property indicates the name of the compiler executable to invoke.

summary.para: Gets the name of the compiler executable.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract string FileExtension { get; }
.property instance string FileExtension

Docs.value: To be added: an object of type 'string'

remarks.para: This property indicates the file name extension of the source files that are to be compiled.

summary.para: Gets the file name extension to use for source files.
